post:
Hi Folks,

Yep that's right, free Direct Admin license with any UK Inception Hosting VPS.


OpenVZ NVMe SSD: https://inceptionhosting.com/vps.html
OpenVZ SSD Cached: https://inceptionhosting.com/vpsukopenvz.html

KVM NVMe SSD: https://inceptionhosting.com/vpsukkvmssd.html
KVM SSD Cached: https://inceptionhosting.com/vpsukkvm.html
KVM Storage VPS: https://inceptionhosting.com/kvmstoragevps.html

To get your free license just pop a ticket in after ordering/payment with the following information:

Server Hostname:
IP Address (primary):
Operating System and version: 


This is also available for current customers.

Also, virtuozzo 7 VPS in the Netherlands are now available: https://inceptionhosting.com/vpsnlopenvz.html No setup fee!
